title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API and model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, stream, and list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama—use local models in chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama—chat, generate, and manage models idiomatically.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template pre-wired with Ollama, Tailwind, and Vercel deploy.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama—DM or mention to chat with local LLMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run Ollama models inside your notes for summarization & Q&A.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for inline code generation and chat via Ollama.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer behaviour for fault-tolerant chats.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to integrate Ollama into mobile and desktop apps.
